{"id":541160637,"lang":"cpp","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1629414209,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/541160637/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n = height.size();\n        int l = 0;\n        int r = n-1;\n        int ans = 0;\n        int m = min(height[l], height[r]);\n        while(l <= r) {\n            if (height[l] <= height[r]) {\n                ans += max(0, m - height[l++]);\n                m = max(m, min(height[l], height[r]));\n            } else {\n                ans += max(0, m - height[r--]);\n                m = max(m, min(height[l], height[r]));\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
